title: My Robotic Lovers
description: She spent nights with a guy and a girl, which humanoid would she choose ...  In the year 2250, Elle owns a flower shop and yearns for a real connection with someone. At a nightclub, she meets Drake, and gets a taste of just what the perfect companion could beâ€”great conversation and even greater sex. Soon after her date with Drake, Elle meets Lisa and experiences that same perfect balance of companionship and sex. But after balancing relationships with both Drake and Lisa, Elle learns a shocking truth. Will she be able to set aside her all-too-human prejudices and accept the real love waiting for her?
author: Olivia Myers
